name: Epic Ninja v1.12
description:
Fight your way across the level, and find the 33 fruits :)

[Arrows or WASD] - Move [Space or H] - Attack

[M] - Music On / Off. [P] - Pause On / Off

[T] - Throw (Shurikens/Pike once picked up)

Hold down to crouch, Tap down to drop through platforms.

Crouching for a second provides you with power for an extra long jumps or kick.

[0] - Level Editor On / Off [1...9] Select Tile Type

[Q & E] - Cycle Tile Sets [F] Toggle fly mode
